snippet: Presidential advisers and a panel of intellectuals struggled Tuesday to work out ways to boost backing for the draft constitution, set to go before voters on Saturday.
abstract: Egyptian Pres Mohamed Morsi's advisers and panel of intellectuals struggle to work out last-minute proposals that might broaden support for Islamist-backed draft constitution set to go before Egypt's voters on Dec 15.

byline.original: By DAVID D. KIRKPATRICK and KAREEM FAHIM

lead_paragraph: Presidential advisers and a panel of intellectuals struggled Tuesday to work out ways to boost backing for the draft constitution, set to go before voters on Saturday.

headline.seo: In Cairo, Effort to Broaden Support for Charter
headline.main: In Cairo, Effort to Broaden Support for Charter
headline.print_headline: In Cairo, Effort to Broaden Support for Charter
